trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the current execution state of the thread.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A state that indicates the thread has been initialized, but has not yet started.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A state that indicates the thread is waiting to use a processor because no processor is free.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The thread is prepared to run on the next available processor.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A state that indicates the thread is currently using a processor.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A state that indicates the thread is about to use a processor.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx x xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Only one thread can be in this state at a time.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xx xx xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A state that indicates the thread has finished executing and has exited.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A state that indicates the thread is waiting for a resource, other than the processor, before it can execute.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx x xxxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
For example, it might be waiting for its execution stack to be paged in from disk.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The state of the thread is unknown.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A state that indicates the thread is not ready to use the processor because it is waiting for a peripheral operation to complete or a resource to become free.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
When the thread is ready, it will be rescheduled.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx$ xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
